channel.title: 11DBHK's Lottery
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "11DBHK's Lottery"

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded: This is for those that have all 5 items in wheel and 7 trophy and don't use ryo anymore.

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded:
Bought 100 tickets, just for kicks. I don't expect to win, but it'd be nice.

I'll probably only buy a handful a day from here out tho

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded:
Hmmmâ€¦. perhaps, but you'd have to just play a few hundred ryo each day and hope for the best.

Also, considering that this is somewhat new, I'm sure not as many people played it as will in the future. I wouldn't be surprised it that number reaches 30,000 tickets before long.

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded:
Well, real lotteries have odds that are less than 1 in 1 million. This lottery is only 1 in 18,000.

So yeah, your chances are pretty much piss. But the +250 stamina potions would be awesome for #1 runs.

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded:
"The Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math."

It's probably not worth playing at all, but if you're going to, invest just a little each day and hope for the best.

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded: The chance of winning is so spectacularly small, that I wouldn't suggest spending a lot on the lotto unless you really have nothing else to spend it on.

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded: Damn! 50's just a drop in the bucket I guess. I wonder what the best number to buy in order to get a decent chance of winning but without spending ridiculous amounts of cash would be?

item.title: Re: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded:
Well, there's only 1 winner a day, so it's an incredible long shot, regardless.

I know a guy who bought 800 tickets yesterday (80,000 ryo worth). He only won one of the potions.

item.title: 11DBHK's Lottery
item.content:encoded: So I bought 50 tickets today. Anyone think I might win? How many tickets do you guys buy?
